document_data.name: Battlebanners Passage
document_data.mainbody: '''Battlebanners Passage''' was a hallway in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Description: The passage held a succession of faded trophies along its length. There were doors along its length; at least two doors, one on each side, led to narrow, dimly lit passageways.
document_data.History: In the aftermath of the massacre during the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlink|1479}}, the [[War Wizards]] [[Welwyn Tracegar]] and [[Yarjack Blamreld]] used it to go towards [[Glathra Barcantle]]; they took no great notice of [[Mirt]] and [[Storm Silverhand]] moving across the hallway, perpendicular to them.
